cmake_add_all_subdirs()

cmake_genrule
  OUTS "dictionary.pickle"
  SRCS "dictionary.tar.bz2"
  CMD "tar xjf $< -C $(@D)",
)

cmake_genrule
  OUTS "embeddings.pickle"
  SRCS "embeddings.tar.bz2"
  CMD "tar xjf $< -C $(@D)",
)

cmake_py_library(
  NAME
    inst2vec
  SRCS
    "__init__.py"
  DATA
    ::dictionary
    ::embeddings
  DEPS
    ::inst2vec_preprocess
    compiler_gym::util
  PUBLIC
)

cmake_py_library(
  NAME
    inst2vec_preprocess
  SRCS
    "inst2vec_preprocess.py"
  DEPS
    ::rgx_utils
  PUBLIC
)

cmake_py_library(
  NAME
    rgx_utils
  SRCS
    "rgx_utils.py"
  PUBLIC
)
